definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

sentences.english: His trousers were neatly pressed and his new jacket was just so .
sentences.chinese: 他的褲子燙得很勻整，新外套也是如此。

sentences.english: I received a letter from her in her neat script .
sentences.chinese: 我收到她的字體很勻整的來信。
